div.p: No 92-1420, unit 167, VPRS 805 inward and outward correspondence — subject, VA 913 Public Library of Victoria, Public Record Office, Victoria.

19/8/92
For reply, see T. Bride to M, 5 September 1892 (in this edition as 92-09-05a).

Herewith, dear Dr Bride, I send the just received supplemental volume of Saccardos Sylloge Fungorum.
Saccardo (1882-1931), most likely vol. 10, published on 30 June 1892. You know, that I presented the other volumes to the public Library. But as I am now reduced so very much (three-fourth) in the working expenses of the Department, perhaps the trustees may be willing to purchase this volume. Dulau & Co charge me £2 - for it. But if no fund is readily available, I will present this also.
MS annotations: 'Purchase. Lib. Com. 25.8.92' and 'Cheque forwarded. 5.9.92'.
